channel.title: [PI] Webclient help
channel.description:
Hi, I just followed a tutorial on how to make a webclient. Everything worked, but the webclient just seems to get stuck loading at some point. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/qxp2u1.png[/img] Tutorial I used; [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/355865-webclient-tutorial-000webhost.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/355865-webclient-tutorial-000webhost.html[/url] My base; [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/445670-deathlypvpz-v2-pi.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/445670-deathlypvpz-v2-pi.html[/url] My HTML code: [CODE] iPvP - The ultimate PKing experience.
Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to runGet the latest Java technology at http://www.java.com/
XAT chatbox will be out soon!
[/CODE] Thanks in advance!
